snippet.title: Siralim Ultimate - Kickstarter Trailer
snippet.description:
Support us on Kickstarter: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/zackbertok/siralim-ultimate-monster-catching-rpg

Wishlist on Steam:  https://store.steampowered.com/app/1289810/Siralim_Ultimate/
___________________________________________________________________________

Siralim Ultimate is a monster-catching, dungeon-crawling RPG with a ridiculous amount of depth. Summon over 1000 different creatures and travel through randomly generated dungeons to acquire resources, new creatures, and loot.

Features
- 1000+ creatures to collect
- Fuse your creatures together - the offspring inherits its parents’ stats, traits, and even the way they look!
- Randomly generated dungeons spanning 21 tilesets
- Customize your castle with thousands of different decorations
- Engage in strategic 6v6 battles
- Craft Artifacts and Spell Gems for your creatures
- Insane amount of post-story content that will keep you engaged for thousands of hours (yes, really!)
- An ever-changing world that is sure to keep the game feeling fresh even for the most devoted of players
- Coming soon to Windows, Mac, Linux, Android, iOS, Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, and Xbox One.

___________________________________________________________________________

Connect with us!

Website/Blog: http://www.thylacinestudios.com/
Forums: https://forums.thylacinestudios.com/
Discord: https://discord.gg/thylacinestudios
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ThylacineStudios/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ThylaStudios
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/Siralim/
